message: Usually I'll see this on new topics.  I'm guessing it is something where people have posted, then deleted a post, but the unread count doesn't decrease.
@jeffl8n you're correct. Sometimes when messages get deleted, the unread count doesn't update properly. We're working on a fix for this.
I guess I couldn't hunt fast enough since @leah beat me to it. There was actually another topic on this here: https://convore.com/feedback/number-of-unread-messages-number-of-replies/
@leah Sorry, I did a search for an existing topic on it, but obviously didn't find it.  Let me know if I can be of any help in fixing or testing it.
